markdown.h: Table to hold all the line data used in the analysis of spectra.

markdown.t: A simple table to hold all the atomic and molecular line data used in the
astrophysical analysis of spectra.  All spectroscopic analyses within
the GES Survey use these atomic data.
The contents of this table are more full documented in 'Line-lists
for the Gaia-ESO Survey', version 5 (for the molecular line data) and
version 6 (for the atomic line data), produced by the GES line-list
group, see:
Line-lists for the Gaia-ESO Survey (v5)
Line-lists for the Gaia-ESO Survey (v6)
Note that this report describes FITS files containing the atomic data,
not the database table available here.  The table contains exactly the
same data, but obviously the FITS-specific parts of the document are not
relevant.
Also, for convenience the Line-list group has prepared a
Bibtex file
containing all the references listed in the report and included as
reference columns in the table (these columns have names of the form
somethingRef).
Required constraints: primary key is (lineID)

lineID.name: lineID
lineID.description: Line identifier: unique identifier for each line.

name1.name: name1
name1.description: Name, first line: chemical symbol for element.

ion.name: ion
ion.description: Ionisation stage of atom or molecule, eg. 1

isotope1.name: isotope1
isotope1.description: Isotope information for element (0 if only one isotope present).

isotope2.name: isotope2
isotope2.description: Isotope information for element (0 if only one isotope present).

isotope3.name: isotope3
isotope3.description: Isotope information for element (0 if only one isotope present).

loggfErr.name: loggfErr
loggfErr.description: Experimental error in column logGf (if applicable).

loggfFlag.name: loggfFlag
loggfFlag.description: Flag: relative quality of column logGf: Y - recommended; U - undecided (maybe); N - not recommended.

landeRef.name: landeRef
landeRef.description: Reference for Lande factors (columns landeLow, landeUp and landeMean).

starkDamp.name: starkDamp
starkDamp.description: Stark broadening per perturber at 10,000 K (log(FWHM).

vdwDamp.name: vdwDamp
vdwDamp.description: >0: Broadening by HI, INTEGER(sigma), alpha ABO theory; <0: Van der Waals broad. per perturber at 10,000 K  (log(FWHM).

synFlag.name: synFlag
synFlag.description: Blending quality for synthesis: Y - relatively unblended; U - maybe useful for some stars; N - badly blended and not recommended.

lType.name: lType
lType.description:
Line type:
ltype Description
1 Molecular lines only.
2 Atomic lines including data for unresolved fine, hyper-fine or isotopic splitting, if present.
3 Atomic lines excluding data for unresolved fine, hyper-fine or isotopic splitting.

deprecated.name: deprecated
deprecated.description: Deprecation code: a value other than 0 means the data are deprecated and should not be used

markdown.h: The Target table contains the master target list of stars observed in the GES survey.

markdown.t: The Target table is the master target list of stars observed in the GES
survey.  For each star, in addition to the identifier and celestial
coordinates, some summary parameters derived from analysis of the spectra
are included for convenience.
The target list was defined by the GES Consortium.
Required constraints: primary key is (targetID)

targetID.name: targetID
targetID.description: Unique ID for each target object

esoName.name: esoName
esoName.description: ESO name of target object; used to name FITS file

cName.name: cName
cName.description: Unique Gaia-ESO Survey object name formed from the coordinates of the object (can be used in place of object to give a unique name)

htmID.name: htmID
htmID.description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (20-deep) number, mainly useful internally for indexing on position

cx.name: cx
cx.description: Cartesian x of unit (RA, Dec) vector on celestial sphere

cy.name: cy
cy.description: Cartesian y of unit (RA, Dec) vector on celestial sphere

cz.name: cz
cz.description: Cartesian z of unit (RA, Dec) vector on celestial sphere

jMag.name: jMag
jMag.description: VISTA VHS or VVV J magnitude

jMagErr.name: jMagErr
jMagErr.description: VISTA VHS or VVV J magnitude error

hMag.name: hMag
hMag.description: VISTA VHS or VVV H magnitude

hMagErr.name: hMagErr
hMagErr.description: VISTA VHS or VVV H magnitude error

ksMag.name: ksMag
ksMag.description: VISTA VHS or VVV Ks magnitude

ksMagErr.name: ksMagErr
ksMagErr.description: VISTA VHS or VVV Ks magnitude error

distVISTA.name: distVISTA
distVISTA.description: VISTA VHS or VVV source separation distance from GES target

dist2mass.name: dist2mass
dist2mass.description: 2MASS source separation distance from GES target

distUkidss.name: distUkidss
distUkidss.description: Separation between UKIDSS and GES coordinates

distSdss.name: distSdss
distSdss.description: Separation between SDSS and GES coordinates

distApass.name: distApass
distApass.description: Separation between APASS and GES coordinates

eBV.name: eBV
eBV.description: The galactic dust extinction value (Schlegel SFD98)

pmRaErrPpmxl.name: pmRaErrPpmxl
pmRaErrPpmxl.description: Error on PPMXL proper motion in ra

pmDecErrPpmxl.name: pmDecErrPpmxl
pmDecErrPpmxl.description: Error on PPMXL proper motion in dec

distPpmxl.name: distPpmxl
distPpmxl.description: PPMXL source separation distance from GES target

pmRaErrUcac.name: pmRaErrUcac
pmRaErrUcac.description: Error on UCAC proper motion in ra

pmDecErrUcac.name: pmDecErrUcac
pmDecErrUcac.description: Error on UCAC proper motion in dec

distUcac.name: distUcac
distUcac.description: UCAC source separation distance from GES target

markdown.t: Table of aliases for cNames.
Required constraints: primary key is (targetID)

cNameAlias.name: cNameAlias
cNameAlias.description: Unique Gaia-ESO Survey object name formed from the coordinates of the object (at epoch of first observation)

cName.name: cName
cName.description: Definitive unique Gaia-ESO Survey object name formed from the coordinates of the object (at epoch of observation)

markdown.h: List of programmes comprising the GES survey.

markdown.t: This table contains details of the individual programmes which comprise
the GES survey.
TODO
Two columns are currently retained from the corresponding VSA table.
Experience will show whether they are needed in GES
Required constraints: primary key is (programmeID)

title.name: title
title.description: a short title for the programme, eg. "Bulge Survey"

description.name: description
description.description: a concise description of the programme

workGroup.name: workGroup
workGroup.description: GES working group responsible for the programme

reference.name: reference
reference.description: Bibliographic reference to a publication describing the programme

url.name: url
url.description: URL for a Web page describing the programme

propPeriod.name: propPeriod
propPeriod.description: the proprietory period for any data taken for the programme in months, e.g. 12 for open time

dfsIDString.name: dfsIDString
dfsIDString.description: The description used within the data flow system (i.e. the value of the appropriate FITS keyword)

markdown.h: Details of each release of the GES survey.

markdown.t: This table lists all the releases of the GES survey.  (There is a
corresponding Release table for each (every?) survey curated by WFAU.)
Required constraints: primary key is (surveyID, releaseNum)
(surveyID) references Survey(surveyID)

surveyID.name: surveyID
surveyID.description: The unique identifier for the survey

description.name: description
description.description: A brief description of the release

dbName.name: dbName
dbName.description: The name of the SQL Server database containing this release

deprecated.name: deprecated
deprecated.description: Deprecated flag: coded as current=0 or deprecated !=0

markdown.h: Contains details of the matrix of the Archive's required curation tasks.

markdown.t: This table contains details of the matrix of the curation tasks
required for the archive; each time a curation task is run, this table
gets updated with timestamps and indicating the status of the
curation process.
Required constraints: primary key is (cuEventID)
(cuID) references CurationTask(cuID)

cuEventID.name: cuEventID
cuEventID.description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

logFile.name: logFile
logFile.description: filename of verbose logged task output

timeStamp.name: timeStamp
timeStamp.description: Time of the completion of the whole task

curator.name: curator
curator.description: The archive curation scientist responsible for this event

comment.name: comment
comment.description: Comment string supplied by the curator

rolledBack.name: rolledBack
rolledBack.description: Flag for roll-back of this event: 0=no, 1 = yes

markdown.h: Contains a list of all curation tasks that are used within the OSA.

markdown.t: Required constraints: primary key is (cuID)

description.name: description
description.description: description in words for this task

markdown:
$Id: GES_CurationLogsSchema.sql 632 2017-07-21 11:00:11Z EckhardSutorius $
Database schema file containing SQL to create the GES curation tables.
Original author: 
  Clive Davenhall, Information Services, University of Edinburgh.
